mapper.sql:
WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.CD_NO = '201'
AND (
UPPER(T1.LICENSE_NAME) = UPPER(#{licenseName})
UPPER(T1.LICENSE_NAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{licenseName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%'))
OR UPPER(T1.LICENSE_NAME) IN (select UPPER(LICENSE_NAME) from LICENSE_NICKNAME where
UPPER(LICENSE_NICKNAME) = UPPER(CONCAT(#{licenseName}))
UPPER(LICENSE_NICKNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{licenseName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%'))
) OR
UPPER(T1.SHORT_IDENTIFIER) = UPPER(CONCAT(#{licenseName}))
UPPER(T1.SHORT_IDENTIFIER) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{licenseName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%'))
)
AND T1.LICENSE_TYPE = #{licenseType}
AND REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(IFNULL(T1.LICENSE_TEXT, ''),'\r\n', ' '),'\n', ' '), ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{licenseText},'\r\n', ' '),'\n', ' '), ' ', ''),'%')
AND REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(IFNULL(T1.DESCRIPTION, ''),'\r\n', ' '),'\n', ' '), ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{description},'\r\n', ' '),'\n', ' '), ' ', ''),'%')
AND (T1.WEBPAGE LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{homepageUrl}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%') OR T3.WEBPAGE LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{homepageUrl}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%'))
AND T1.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{creator},'%')
AND T1.MODIFIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modifier},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{createdFrom}
AND DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{createdTo}
AND DATE_FORMAT(T1.MODIFIED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{modifiedFrom}
AND DATE_FORMAT(T1.MODIFIED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{modifiedTo}
AND T1.OBLIGATION_NEEDS_CHECK_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.OBLIGATION_DISCLOSING_SRC_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.OBLIGATION_NOTIFICATION_YN = 'Y'
AND IFNULL(T1.OBLIGATION_NEEDS_CHECK_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T1.OBLIGATION_NOTIFICATION_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T1.OBLIGATION_DISCLOSING_SRC_YN, 'N') = 'N'
AND
FIND_IN_SET(#{item}, T1.RESTRICTION)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LICENSE_MASTER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_CODE_DTL T2 ON T1.LICENSE_TYPE = T2.CD_DTL_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT LICENSE_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(WEBPAGE) AS WEBPAGE FROM LICENSE_WEBPAGE GROUP BY LICENSE_ID) T3 ON T1.LICENSE_ID = T3.LICENSE_ID

SELECT T1.LICENSE_ID, T1.LICENSE_NAME, T2.CD_DTL_NM AS LICENSE_TYPE, CONCAT( IF(T1.OBLIGATION_NOTIFICATION_YN = 'Y', 'Y', 'N'), IF(T1.OBLIGATION_DISCLOSING_SRC_YN = 'Y', 'Y', 'N') ) as OBLIGATIONS, T1.SHORT_IDENTIFIER, T1.WEBPAGE, T1.DESCRIPTION, T1.LICENSE_TEXT, T1.ATTRIBUTION, IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE T1.CREATOR = USER_ID), T1.CREATOR) AS CREATOR, IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE T1.MODIFIER = USER_ID), T1.MODIFIER) AS MODIFIER, T1.CREATED_DATE, T1.MODIFIED_DATE, T1.RESTRICTION FROM LICENSE_MASTER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_CODE_DTL T2 ON T1.LICENSE_TYPE = T2.CD_DTL_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT LICENSE_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(WEBPAGE) AS WEBPAGE FROM LICENSE_WEBPAGE GROUP BY LICENSE_ID) T3 ON T1.LICENSE_ID = T3.LICENSE_ID
ORDER BY T1.LICENSE_ID ASC
ORDER BY T1.LICENSE_ID DESC
ORDER BY T1.LICENSE_NAME ASC
ORDER BY T1.LICENSE_NAME DESC
ORDER BY T1.SHORT_IDENTIFIER ASC
ORDER BY T1.SHORT_IDENTIFIER DESC
ORDER BY T1.LICENSE_TYPE ASC
ORDER BY T1.LICENSE_TYPE DESC
ORDER BY T1.WEBPAGE ASC
ORDER BY T1.WEBPAGE DESC
ORDER BY T1.DESCRIPTION ASC
ORDER BY T1.DESCRIPTION DESC
ORDER BY T1.CREATOR ASC
ORDER BY T1.CREATOR DESC
ORDER BY T1.CREATED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY T1.CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY T1.MODIFIED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY T1.MODIFIED_DATE DESC

SELECT T1.LICENSE_ID, T1.LICENSE_NAME, T2.CD_DTL_NM AS LICENSE_TYPE, CONCAT( IF(T1.OBLIGATION_NOTIFICATION_YN = 'Y', 'Y', 'N'), IF(T1.OBLIGATION_DISCLOSING_SRC_YN = 'Y', 'Y', 'N') ) as OBLIGATIONS, T1.SHORT_IDENTIFIER, T1.WEBPAGE, T1.DESCRIPTION, T1.LICENSE_TEXT, T1.ATTRIBUTION, T1.MODIFIER, T1.MODIFIED_DATE, T1.RESTRICTION, T1.CREATOR, T1.CREATED_DATE FROM LICENSE_MASTER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_CODE_DTL T2 ON T1.LICENSE_TYPE = T2.CD_DTL_NO WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.LICENSE_ID = #{licenseId}
SELECT LICENSE_NICKNAME FROM LICENSE_NICKNAME WHERE LICENSE_NAME = #{licenseName}
